blist.li:
Native Object Pascal multiplatform library with no dependencies on any dynamically linked libraries or other platform specific binaries. Supported platforms are:
MS Windows
x86 and AMD64 Linux
FreeBSD
DOS
.NET (using unmanaged DLL)

Loading and saving of these image file formats:
PNG
JPEG
DDS
TGA
MNG
JNG
BMP

Many internal image data formats:
8, 16, 24, 32, 48 and 64 bit RGB and ARGB formats
indexed formats
grayscale formats
floating point formats (IEEE754 and half)
compressed formats like DXT1/3/5
Basic image manipulation functions working for all supported data formats and conversions between them.
Low level library interface (accessible by other programming languages) and high level OOP one.
Extensions for creating OpenGL, Direct3D, and SDL textures/surfaces.
VCL, CLX and LCL graphic classes and functions.
Drawing, effects, and filters (only basic support now).
Support for mipmaps, multiimages, direct access to image data, user-specified file formats, overriding default read and write functions, and much more.
